channel.title: Problem with no-ip. please help me
channel.description:
hi,
I made a host at no-ip.com and I downloaded duc, but when I try to run my server with that address it doesn't work. It stays at "connecting to update server" and I don't know what I did wrong. I did read other posts but didn't help.
So please help me
thank you,
startcode

item.title: Problem with no-ip. please help me
item.dc:creator: @startcode startcode
item.description:
@startcode wrote:

done that few times but still didn’t work =/

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with no-ip. please help me

item.title: Problem with no-ip. please help me
item.dc:creator: @dds_asap dds asap
item.description:
@dds_asap wrote:

do 192.168.0.1 and enter ur login stuff, then on the home page you should see “ip:*********” copy this then paste it when it says “ip” on no-ip and then click save, re-download and sorted

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with no-ip. please help me

item.title: Problem with no-ip. please help me
item.dc:creator: @startcode startcode
item.description:
@startcode wrote:

Yh but i wanted to start a 508 server few months ago but i quit that and at that time i made myself a no-ip address and it worked back then and now it doesn’t how is that possible?

thank you,

startcode

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with no-ip. please help me

item.title: Problem with no-ip. please help me
item.dc:creator: @towriss towriss
item.description:
@towriss wrote:

dont use the no-ip you made use 127.0.0.1

the no-ip you made is for other players

Read full topic
